prompt:
Create a premium Todo App main page with cutting-edge UI/UX:

DESIGN REQUIREMENTS:
- Apple-inspired refined UI (iOS 17 style)
- Glassmorphism + Neumorphism fusion
- Fluid animations (CSS/Tailwind only, no Framer Motion)
- Full dark mode support (system settings sync)
- 3D transform effects
- Particle background animations
- Micro-interactions on all elements

FEATURES:
- Todo list CRUD operations
- Drag & drop reordering (HTML5 DnD API)
- Real-time search
- Category/tag management
- Priority levels with color coding
- Due date management with calendar
- Progress visualization
- Local storage persistence
- PWA support with offline functionality

PERFORMANCE:
- Virtual scrolling (10k items)
- Lazy loading
- Optimized re-renders
- Web Vitals optimization

ACCESSIBILITY:
- WCAG AAA compliance
- Full keyboard navigation
- Screen reader optimized
- High contrast mode

Follow AI-First principles (single file) while achieving the best UI/UX.

Premium Todo Item Component:

DESIGN:
- Card design with layered shadows
- 3D floating effect on hover
- Swipe gesture support
- Celebration animation on completion (confetti, stars)
- Priority-based gradient backgrounds
- Colorful tag display
- Warning animation for approaching deadlines

INTERACTIONS:
- Inline editing (double-click)
- Long press context menu
- Swipe to delete/archive
- Pinch for details
- Drag handle display

STATUS DISPLAY:
- Progress bar for ongoing tasks
- Subtask support
- Attachment icons
- Comment count badges
- Last updated timestamp

Implement as completely self-contained component.

Premium Input Form Component:

DESIGN:
- Floating input field
- AI suggestion UI (simulated)
- Voice input button (Web Speech API)
- Emoji picker
- Rich text editor style

FEATURES:
- Natural language parsing
- Template functionality
- Recent tags suggestion
- Keyboard shortcuts
- Multi-line support

ANIMATIONS:
- Ripple effect on focus
- Micro-animations on typing
- Submit button fill animation
- Success checkmark animation

Completely self-contained, no external libraries.

Statistics Dashboard Component:

VISUALIZATIONS:
- Pie chart (SVG animations)
- Line graph (completion rate trends)
- Heatmap (activity calendar)
- 3D-style bar charts

STATISTICS:
- Completion rate (animated counter)
- Productivity score
- Streak (consecutive days)
- Category analysis
- Time-based performance

INTERACTIVE ELEMENTS:
- Hover for details
- Click to drill down
- Period filter (today/week/month/year)
- Data export feature

DESIGN:
- Dashboard layout
- Gradient cards
- Animated numbers
- Achievement badges

Implement with SVG and CSS only, no external chart libraries.

Advanced Filter Bar Component:

UI/UX:
- Segment control (iOS style)
- Animated tab switching
- Advanced filters (popover)
- Integrated search bar
- Sort functionality

FILTER FEATURES:
- Status (all/active/completed/archived)
- Priority filter
- Due date filter (today/this week/overdue)
- Tag filter (multi-select)
- Custom filter creation

DESIGN:
- Sticky header
- Blur background
- Active state animations
- Filter count badges

SAVE FEATURES:
- Filter presets
- Recently used filters
- URL parameter sync

Completely self-contained with advanced functionality.
